name: Django-flat-admin
tagline: Modern Flat theme for Django Admin
body:
### Welcome to Django Flat Admin.
Modern Flat theme for Django Admin

### Features
* Modern flat and professional design
* Useful CSS/JS addons
* Based on Twitter Bootstrap
* Simple installation
* CKEditor for textareas

### Screenshots
![Django Flat Admin](http://www.eggforsale.com/site_media/media/1ce2f618/products/screenshots/5_3.png.1170x658_q100_crop.jpg)

### Authors and Contributors
bespider (@bespider) for EggForSale (@eggforsale) created Django Flat Admin.

### Support or Contact
